properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 7 at 1:29PM EST until February 8 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Blacksburg VA
properties.description:
...Strong Gusty Winds Through This Afternoon...
...Accumulating Snow West of the Blue Ridge...

* WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches.
Winds gusting as high as 45 mph.

* WHERE...Smyth County.

* WHEN...Until midnight EST tonight.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult especially during the
evening commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty winds will also generate blowing
and drifting snow.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EST TONIGHT
